page.title: 20THE W.I. IN AYMESTREY
page.content: {The Leinthall Earles and Aymestrey {WI}is an amalgamation of 2 groups and the 20 or so members meet in Aymestrey Village Hall once a month. After dealing with necessary business a talk or demonstration is given mainly of rural or domestic interest but the new image WI is trying to widen the range of activities. The average age is over 40 but there is no lack of energy or enthusiasm for the organisation which, until recently, provided the only social outlet for women in the area. The annual jumble sale, outings. Christmas Dinner and party for the local children are much enjoyed and the WI is involved in organisation and catering for most Village functions. It is the members of this group with help from husbands and friends who have collected the information for this section of the survey.
